name: JobsFor10.com
overview:
JobsFor10 is a unique site where anyone can buy and sell services for $10 (also known as micro-outsourcing).

Ever find yourself in a situation where you need to have something small done quickly but just couldnâ€™t find the right person for the job?

Such situations happen to thousands of us each day, and JobsFor10 has become just the place to go to when looking to have your tasks done now â€“ quickly, efficiently, and in high quality.

You no longer have to worry about feeling uncomfortable asking a colleague or acquaintance to help you out or pay $60 hourly rate for everage professional, when you can get a pro to do exactly what you need for just $10!

The sellers are professional in there field of experty, that fact gives them an adventage which translate into making quality jobs for an effordable rates.

$10 is just the amount of money most buyers could afford and on the same time sellers are able to put efforts to ensure quality service.

The win-win situation between the sellers and the buyers enabled by automated ranking system where buyers and sellers closing deals by the hours.
